Publication Date: September 9, 2022
Closing Date: September 29, 2022, 14:00 Eastern Time

**Notice Details**
____________________
This Request for Information (RFI) is issued by the Department of National Defence Directorate of Soldier Systems Program Management (DSSPM) to seek industry feedback on the proposed procurement of a new Sleeping Bag System (SBS) for Search and Rescue Technicians (SAR Techs).

**Purpose**
To gather industry insights on commercially available products, assess feasibility and appropriateness of the requirements, and understand current and future industry capabilities.

**Procurement Details**

* The proposed procurement is for stock replenishment and sustainment.
* The objectives of this RFI are:
  - To gain a clear understanding of available products.
  - To determine the feasibility and appropriateness of the requirements.
  - To understand industry capabilities.

**Notice: Attachment**

* RFI Document: Search and Rescue Sleeping Bag System (English) [PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/09/054c59dd2de436aeb021834ab76a7bab/rfi_w8486-238825_search_and_rescue_sleeping_bag_system_en.pdf)
* RFI Document (French) [PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/09/dc2754ecc2c652a4b329acaf412c9cac/rfi_w8486-238825_search_and_rescue_sleeping_bag_system_fr.pdf)

**Addendum**

* Responses to this RFI are not binding, and the Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Deliverables**
To be delivered to the Department of National Defence within the designated timeframe.

**Where to Send Submissions**

* Submissions must be made electronically through the Supplier Linked Access (SupplierLINC) system.

**Language**
Documents may be submitted in either English or French.

Please note: Meeting the deadline of September 29, 2022, 14:00 Eastern Time is mandatory. Please make sure submissions are made on supplierLINC in order for you to be formally acknowledged as having submitted the response.
